Create a colorful and functional bottle cap holder: You can make a cute and practical bottle cap holder by using a piece of corkboard and some ribbons or strings to hang the bottle caps. This can be a great way to organize and display your collection of bottle caps.

Use bottle caps as planters: Cut the top off of the bottle cap and poke a few drainage holes in the bottom. Then, fill the bottle cap with soil and plant a small herb or flower in it. This is a great way to add some greenery to your home or office.
Make a bird feeder out of a bottle cap: Tie a string around the neck of the bottle cap and fill it with birdseed. Then, hang the bird feeder outside and watch the birds come to enjoy the treats.
Create a bottle cap mosaic: Use bottle caps to create a colorful mosaic on a piece of wood or a canvas. You can arrange the bottle caps in a pattern or create a design that you like.

Use bottle caps as a DIY jewelry: You can make unique and colorful jewelry pieces by using bottle caps. For example, you can make a necklace or bracelet by attaching beads or charms to the bottle caps.
